submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, hc: List[int], vc: List[int]) -> int:
        H,V=1,1
        hc.sort(reverse = True)
        vc.sort(reverse = True)
        ans = 0
        i,j = 0,0
        while i<len(hc) and j<len(vc):
            if hc[i]<=vc[j]:
                ans+=vc[j]*V
                H+=1
                j+=1

            else:
                ans+=hc[i]*H
                V+=1
                i+=1

        while i<len(hc):
                ans+=hc[i]*H
                V+=1
                i+=1

        while j<len(vc):
            ans+=vc[j]*V
            H+=1
            j+=1

        return ans
